Title: Back to Phase 2
Paragraphs: Singapore authorities have once again tightened measures on social interactions, in a bid to cut down the growing number of locally transmitted Covid-19 cases in the community. We found out in our poll that more than half of respondents agreed such a move it’s necessary, but it doesn’t mean everyone is happy about it. And, if the situation gets worse, 88% say they are in favour of another circuit breaker. Check out our poll results below.
Author: Faizal Kamal
